description:
Soul Blazer is a classic SNES action RPG.
Free all the peoples.
Make Deathtoll pay!

v0.1.0.beta.3.description:
Another quick build with more fixes for game-breaking bugs:
* Fixed getting stuck in boss arenas if the lair reward was a remote item.
* Fixed soft-lock where getting a lair release from the big pearl chest would leave you stranded without the dolphin to bring you back.
* Improved Anti-stuck. Removed the flaky impassible terrain checks which caused more problems than were prevented. Anti-stuck checks now only run in Act hubs.
* The Phoenix cut-scene softlock fix had some malformed ASM which resulted in an even worse problem. Should be fixed for real now.
* Fixed issue where getting an NPC release from the Pass tile could get you trapped.

**Attention: Please save your game early, and often. Having a save to fall back to can save you a lot of time if you happen to stumble onto another game-breaking bug.**

(Thanks everyone who has tested the rando and reported their findings.)

v0.1.0.beta.4.description:
* Fixed logic errors where Mermaid Queen and Greenwood's Guardian could have their own item.
* Fixed ram addresses for a handful of chests in acts 5 and 6 which had abnormal chest-data entries.

v0.1.0.beta.5.description:
Fixes:
* Fixed issue where getting the mole's ribbon before opening the chest in greenwood's tunnels could make the chest unobtainable
* Fixed issue where one of the chests in Magridd Castle basement was using the wrong flag index
* Fixed issue where receiving an item while riding a raft in lostside marsh could softlock the player.
v0.1.0.beta.5.title: v0.1.0.beta.5

v0.1.0.beta.7.description:
Fixed Another Logic Bug:
* There was a lair locked behind the sleeping mushroom's dream in Act 4 that was not accounted for in logic.
v0.1.0.beta.7.title: v0.1.0.beta.7

v0.1.0.beta.8.description:
* Game no longer processes remote items while button readouts are inhibited (in a cut-scene, riding the rafts, etc).
* Fixed getting black screen when getting lair release right after save.
* Fixed super bracelet tile so that you can get two lairs if the super bracelet tile gives Queen Magridd's item too.
* Improved Anti-stuck mitigation. Now redirects your return location to a close safe spot rather than boot you to a different map.
* Moved Roof Fix hook to a different location to prevent problems if you get 2 lair releases without leaving the building.
* Figured out how to reload map on teleport, allowing boss rooms to be reloaded even if you don't get an NPC release.
* Client no longer sends items while you are fighting a boss.
v0.1.0.beta.8.title: v0.1.0.beta.8

v0.1.0.beta6.description:
Bug Fixes:
* Fixed race condition which would occasionally cause the client to skip sending items.
* Also added 3 frame delay to avoid occasionally getting nothing instead of something when mashing through received items.
* Fixed logic bug where the chest and lair locked behind Lisa's dream were not.
v0.1.0.beta6.title: v0.1.0.beta.6

v0.2.0.description:
Things are stable enough now that I feel OK removing the beta designation and a significant version number bump.

Changes:
* Client no longer sends items when lair is in progress of being cleared
* Fixed logic bug where an incorrect lair was marked as needing mermaids tears
* Fixed Lair 173 location name (was not in Durean)
* Fixed EXP values from slot data
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.3.0.description:
Changes:
Added Souls (Soul of Magician, Soul of Light, etc) to Item Pool and Logic. Soul NPCs are now item-giving locations like the rest.

Lots of New Options:
* Text Speed
  * Fast
  * Instant
* Goal
  * Defeat Deathtoll
  * Emblem Hunt: Find all 8 Emblems and bring them to the Greenwood Gem Fairy to win the game
* Act Progression
  * Vanilla
  * Open (all Acts/Worlds open from the start)
* Stones Placement (Choose where stones get placed)
  * Vanilla
  * Bosses
  * Totally Random
* Stones Count: Number of Stones needed to open the World of Evil
* Open Deathtoll: Whether Deathtoll's Palace is open at the start of the game or not
* Equipment Stats
  * Vanilla: No change to the way Weapons/Armor work
  * Semi-Progressive: Equipment strength/defense scales with the number of swords/armors obtained
  * Shuffled: Shuffles the stats of all swords and armor
* Equipment Scaling
  * Vanilla: Swords/Armor follow the vanilla 1/2/3/4/6/8/10/12 strength/defense progression
  * Improved: Swords/Armor follow an improved 1/3/5/7/9/12/12/12 strength/defense progression
  * Strong: Swords/Armor follow a strong 2/4/6/9/12/12/12/12 strength/defense progression
* Magician Item: Controls what Item the magician gives you
  * Vanilla: The vanilla reward (Flame Ball)
  * Random Spell: A random castable magic spell
  * Totally Random: Any reward in the item pool
* Magician Soul: Controls what you get from the Magician in place his soul
  * Vanilla: You get the Soul of Magician
  * Random Soul: Any progression soul (Soul of Magician, Soul of Light, Soul of Detection)
  * Totally Random: Any reward in the item pool
* Gem/Exp Pool: Modifies Gem/Exp rewards in the pool
  * Vanilla: The same Gem/Exp values as the vanilla game
  * Improved: Gem rewards in the item pool are multiplied by 2, and Exp rewards by 10
  * Random Range: Gem rewards in the pool are randomized in the range of 1-999, and Exp rewards in the range of 1-9999

Some Bug Fixes Too:
* Fixed issue where getting the same NPC multiple times could soft-lock the game.
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
Updated base patch to fix bugs:
* Restored anti-stuck Checks that were inadvertently removed in the reward refactor.
* Patched Village leader scripts to give their items in open mode too.

Fixed logic bug where soul-giving NPCs had the wrong item classification.
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1

v0.3.2.description:
Changes:
* Added more options for starting sword.
* Options now included in slot data.
* Corrected logic bug where the path to Nome (and act 5) had more requirements than needed.
* Added alternate logical path to Magridd Castle Left Tower after Leo Explodes (Soldier who wants Platinum Card will no longer be guarding entrance, allowing access without the card).

Basepatch changes:
* Fix Emblem A tile triggering Watermill Keeper's text repeatedly.
* Fixed bug where all magic cost 1 gem.
* Fixed script for Soldier with item underfoot to prevent him disappearing when Queen Magridd explodes.
v0.3.2.title: v0.3.2

v0.3.3.description:
## What's Changed
* Basepatch: Fix Magridd Castle Soldier with item underfoot disappearing when you talk to him.
* Added Release workflow for automating soulblazer.apworld creation.
* SoulBlazer: Adding in Weak and Broken sword/armor stat progression sets by @jnschurig in https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/pull/1
* Update magridd chest descriptions to be consistent with lair names. by @jnschurig in https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/pull/3

## New Contributors
* @jnschurig made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.3.2...v0.3.3
v0.3.3.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.3.3

v0.3.4.description:
## What's Changed
* Changed patch generation from APDeltaPatch to APProcedurePatch so that the ROM is no longer required during APWorld/Patch generation.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.3.3...v0.3.4
v0.3.4.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.3.4

v0.3.5.description:
## What's Changed
* Fix generation of seeds with non-semi-progressive stat progression.

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.3.4...v0.3.5>
v0.3.5.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.3.5

v0.3.6.description:
## What's Changed
* Fixed logic to make Magician's Soul required for access to Deathtoll.
* Fixed logic to classify two of the mermaids as progression instead of filler because they release platforms in Seabed Sanctuary which could be logically required to progress.

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.3.5...v0.3.6>
v0.3.6.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.3.6

v0.3.7.description:
## What's Changed
### Basepatch
* Fixed having to rewatch Dr. Leo cutscene if he gives you an NPC release.
* Fixed Fire shrine basement crystal not giving you any dialog box for certain item placements.

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.3.6...v0.3.7>
v0.3.7.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.3.7

v0.4.0-beta.1.description:
## What's Changed
### Renamed All the Things
* All items and locations renamed to be clearer (no more Soldier7 or Mushroom2)
* Names generally match with poptracker now, but I made some changes due to lack of context/having to name the unimportant NPCs too
* Bundled item and location data in yaml files
* I might still do another pass or two over item/location names, so maybe more name tweaks in the future

### Refactoring
* Removed support for Python 3.8 and 3.9
* Bundled data-class wizard into APWorld since frozen AP installs do not respect requirements.txt
* Made MIT license for APWorld explicit
* Use more enums

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.3.7...v0.4.0-beta.1>
v0.4.0-beta.1.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.4.0-beta.1

v0.4.0-beta.2.description:
## What's Changed
* Soulblazer dataclass wizard removal by @panicbit in https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/pull/4
* Client now adds misc game state to data storage

### Basepatch
* Fix the register clobber that was causing Lisa to not show up during the ending sequence

## New Contributors
* @panicbit made their first contribution in https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/pull/4

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.4.0-beta.1...v0.4.0-beta.2>
v0.4.0-beta.2.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.4.0-beta.2

## What's Changed
### Enemizer!
* Enemy randomization
* Lair spawn rate randomization
* Should still respect enemy logic for Metal/Spirit/Soul Enemies
* Check out the new yaml config options
* randomize_pre_spawned_enemies **has not been implemented yet!**

v0.4.1.description:

* Register indirect connection to prevent nondeterministic behavior during generation possibly causing generation failures
* Add init file to avoid failing unit test
* Fix misc spelling errors

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.4.0-beta.7...v0.4.1>

v0.5.0.description:
## What's Changed
Updated client code:
* Use new SNIClient on_package overload introduced in AP 0.6.0.
* AP versions earlier than 0.6.0 are no longer supported for this APWorld.
* Use lookup_in_game and lookup_in_slot for item/location names.
* Better handling of slot data and item send queue.

This should hopefully fix the issue users were having with AP 0.6.2. Let me know if there are still problems.
v0.5.0.title: SoulBlazer APWorld v0.5.0

v0.5.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Fix issue with RetroArch not working.
* Fix issue where you would still receive items during the fight with Deathtoll, causing the fight to reset.
* Added AP World manifest in preparation of Archipelago v0.7
* Rebased to current Archipelago codebase.
v0.5.1.title: Soul Blazer APWorld v0.5.1

v0.5.2.description:
## What's Changed
* Added new option for skipping NPC Release Cutscenes
  * See `release_cutscenes` in the world config YAML.
  * Note: If you get an NPC release when you are in the same map as that NPC you will need to leave and reenter to see most changes.

If the option is popular enough I'll consider making skip the default.
v0.5.2.title: Soul Blazer APWorld v0.5.2

v0.5.3.description:
## What's Changed
* Fix jail break dolphin not opening jail with NPC Release cut-scenes skipped.
* Fix minor naming inconsistency.

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3>
v0.5.3.title: Soul Blazer APWorld v0.5.3

v0.6.0.description:
## What's Changed
* Expanded ROM and patched text engine to display many strings in new text bank
* Made detailed NPC names display in game
* Improved Map names in game
* Added Randomizer Credits

I just realized there are a few features I forgot to finish implementing, namely:
* Patch/AP World version on title screen
* Rando hash on File select screen

So expect those Soon™

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.5.3...v0.6.0>
v0.6.0.title: Soul Blazer APWorld v0.6.0

v0.6.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Basepatch: Fix text engine fastrom patch not using new text bank which was causing NPC release cutscenes to hardlock the game.

If you already generated a world with v0.6.0 you should be able to install this APWorld and reapply your existing .apsb patch to fix things.

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/Tranquilite0/Archipelago-SoulBlazer/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1>
v0.6.1.title: Soul Blazer APWorld v0.6.1
